subject: Using JUnit on an RMI Server
msgSnippet: I have been provided an RMI Server and I wish to write some JUnits to ensure that I have coded against the interface correctly. I am wandering how I would go
messageBody:
I have been provided an RMI Server and I wish to write some JUnits to
ensure that I have coded against the interface correctly.

I am wandering how I would go about testing this interface with JUnit,
so that the server is registered and started before the tests begin
etc.

Are there any tools available to help with this?

Cheers,
Whytey
